main_ihm module¶

class main_ihm.MonAppli¶

Bases: QMainWindow

draw_road(width: int, height: int, radius: int, center: QPoint)¶

Draws the road on the display.

Parameters:

  • width – Width of the container

  • height – Height of the container

  • radius – Radius of the road

  • center – Center of the circular road

Returns:

Nothing

Author:

Clément Vellu
